name: Ynth
summary: Ynth is a puzzle game for the iPhone. You control a bug that needs to traverse from one side of a plane to the other by rotating boxes.

name: Ynglet
summary: Swim, launch and bounce through this meditative floating platformer. A reactive soundscape creates the soundtrack to your exploration through the playful puzzles of Ynglet's hand drawn levels.

name: Ynxa
summary:
Help Leaf on his adventure.
Unlock the powers of Air, Fire and Water to escape the perils of the Temple.

Cross and pass the 8 paths of Perseverance to prove your bravery.

Find your way under the gardens and escape from the great pyramid.

name: Yn
summary: Yn is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created in Sly engine for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It stars Madotsuki. Your objective is to explore the dream worlds.

name: Yni^
summary: A sandbox game where you can explore the magical and mystical world of elementals. Create, discover and study ElfenAlien fairyy Realms of Ynithia^ and much more: yayfully emotinal fantasy, colorful amazing miracle challenges and achievements of Subculturarial living in Ypony^
